title: EXCLUSIVE: NASCAR owners explore sale – sources
text:
EXCLUSIVE: NASCAR owners explore sale – sources 48
The majority owners of NASCAR, the company which operates the namesake U.S. car-racing series and other motorsport events, are exploring options that include the sale of a majority stake, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday.
The majority owners of NASCAR, the company which operates the namesake U.S. car-racing series and other motorsport events, are exploring options that include the sale of a majority stake, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Monday. //reut.rs/2rqk42g
